articles.author: Dom Calicchio
articles.title: Army-Navy Game ‘willing to die’ remark makes many Air Force fans feel overlooked
articles.description: Every December, when Army takes on Navy in one of college football’s best-loved traditions, many supporters of the Air Force team get a little annoyed.
articles.content:
Every December, when Army takes on Navy in one of college football’s best-loved traditions, many supporters of the Air Force team get a little annoyed.
That’s because each year on Army-Navy Saturday, someone is bound to make a remark like, “The Army-Navy Gam… [+2054 chars]

articles.author: Danielle Wallace
articles.title: Greta Thunberg apologizes for 'against the wall' remark, plans a break from climate activism
articles.description: Greta Thunberg, the 16-year-old Swedish climate activist, apologized Saturday after telling a crowd of young supporters a day earlier -- while speaking in English -- that politicians should be put “against the wall.”
articles.content:
Greta Thunberg, the 16-year-old Swedishclimate activist, apologized Saturday after telling a crowd of young supporters a day earlier -- while speaking in English -- that politicians should be put “against the wall.”

articles.author: Dom Calicchio
articles.title: Nebraska man on death row for killing 4 – but Texas woman says she’ll marry him: report
articles.description: A 33-year-old Nebraska man on death row for killing four people within 10 days in 2013 has at least one friend still in his corner: a 46-year-old Texas woman who confirmed that she and the killer plan to marry.
articles.content:
A 33-year-old Nebraska man on death row for killing four people within 10 days in 2013 has at least one friend still in his corner: a 46-year-old Texas woman who reportedly has confirmed that she and the killer plan to marry.
But Dawn Arguello of Lubbock isn… [+2939 chars]
